lines.text: It was many and many a year ago / In a kingdom by the sea / That a maiden there lived whom you may know / By the name of Annabel Lee
I'm sorry. Do you miss him?
Yes. What about you? Do you have someone?
I did. A long time ago.
You said that once before, "a long time ago". Makes you sound like an old man. What happened?
Like you, I lost her. But I think about her all the time.
I want to be forgotten completely when I die. I want all trace of my existence to be completely wiped out. Just one of my romantic ideas.
There are some things that cannot be destroyed.
That passes. A year or two of grieving and you're over it. This is what matters - here, now.
